bug.author: Tabrizian
bug.summary: kfctl apply for on prem doesn't work
bug.description:
A fresh installation of kfctl on a new Kubernetes cluster doesn't work. The error below occurred during kfctl apply all -V <denchmark-code>ERRO[0007] (Will retry) Component ambassador apply failed; Error: find objects: /home/iman/Documents/Git/kf-deployment-baremetal/ks_app/lib/ksonnet-lib/v1.15.0/k8s.libsonnet:17681:93-94 Unknown variable: x
"withX-Kubernetes-Embedded-Resource":: self + { "x-kubernetes-embedded-resource": x-kubernetes-embedded-resource }, </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>v20181207-4e7f4ed-198-gaeea303e-dirty-03e65e </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>ks version ksonnet version: 0.13.1 jsonnet version: v0.11.2 client-go version: kubernetes-1.10.4 </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-code>kubectl version Client Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"14", GitVersion:"v1.14.1", GitCommit:"b7394102d6ef778017f2ca4046abbaa23b88c290", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-04-08T17:11:31Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.1", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"} Server Version: version.Info{Major:"1", Minor:"15", GitVersion:"v1.15.0", GitCommit:"e8462b5b5dc2584fdcd18e6bcfe9f1e4d970a529", GitTreeState:"clean", BuildDate:"2019-06-19T16:32:14Z", GoVersion:"go1.12.5", Compiler:"gc", Platform:"linux/amd64"}
</denchmark-code>
